description: This is a gruelling hike from Grizzly Lake, heading up a scree slope and down into the valley beyond. Once over the saddle, the trail descends down into a valley and the remaining kilometres to Divide Lake are gentle (although you'll have to traverse several rock piles along the way.
directions: Just before reaching Grizzly Lake, the trail will fork and will be marked by a blue cairn. Take the right fork and head up into the scree slope.
title: Divide Lake
